Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Raw uPlot options. Change using msg.options.

Array of equal-length series, the first series being the X axis. Change using msg.payload.

Map of colors for discrete values. Change using msg.colors.

Array of labels for series. Change using msg.labels.

Color gradient for values: kind, low, high, low_color, high_color. Change using msg.gradient.

Show values on bars, may be per-series array. Change using msg.show_values.

Make rows clickable. Change using msg.click.
